statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_payments;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, card_number, expiry_date FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT booking_reference, amount FROM luxury_travel_payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01' AND security_code = 1234
SELECT booking_reference, amount, customer_name FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%'
SELECT payment_id, customer_name, expiry_date FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_id
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_bookings;
SELECT customer_name, travel_destination FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE booking_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM luxury_travel_bookings ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT booking_id, payment_method, payment_status FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_amount, customer_name, payment_date FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, travel_destination FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE travel_destination IN ('Paris', 'Maldives', 'Tokyo') AND payment_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, travel_destination, payment_amount FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR customer_name LIKE '%son';

SELECT p.transaction_id, p.payment_method, p.payment_status, b.customer_name FROM payment_transactions p INNER JOIN luxury_travel_bookings b ON p.booking_id = b.booking_id WHERE p.payment_status = 'Successful' ORDER BY p.transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_bookings;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM luxury_travel_bookings ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method, booking_date FROM luxury_travel_bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM luxury_travel_bookings GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM luxury_travel_bookings;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount_paid > 500;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method, booking_date FROM luxury_travel_bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT booking_id, payment_status FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_information;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM booking ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT booking_id, status FROM booking WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM payment_information
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_information ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, payment_information.payment_date FROM customer INNER JOIN payment_information ON customer.customer_id = payment_information.customer_id

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, transaction.transaction_amount FROM customer INNER JOIN transaction ON customer.customer_id = transaction.booking_id WHERE transaction.transaction_amount > 100

SELECT booking.booking_id, payment_information.amount, transaction.transaction_amount FROM booking LEFT JOIN payment_information ON booking.booking_id = payment_information.payment_id LEFT JOIN transaction ON booking.booking_id = transaction.booking_id ORDER BY payment_information.amount DESC, transaction.transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM luxury_clients;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM luxury_clients ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, address FROM luxury_clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM travel_bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM travel_bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_clients;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM luxury_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email_address FROM luxury_clients WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM travel_bookings WHERE departure_city = 'New York' AND destination_city = 'Paris';
